sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Delete Resource User role from Demand Manager role</description>
        <name>Delete Resource User from Demand Manager</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[deleteResourceUserFromDemandManager();

function deleteResourceUserFromDemandManager(){
	var dmnManager =  new GlideRecord('sys_user_role');
	dmnManager.addQuery('name', 'demand_manager');
	dmnManager.query();
	if(!dmnManager.next())
		return;
	
	var resUser =  new GlideRecord('sys_user_role');
	resUser.addQuery('name', 'resource_user');
	resUser.query();
	if(!resUser.next())
		return;
	
	var userRoleContains = new GlideRecord('sys_user_role_contains');
	userRoleContains.addQuery('role', dmnManager.getValue('sys_id'));
	userRoleContains.addQuery('contains', resUser.getValue('sys_id'));
	userRoleContains.query();
	if(userRoleContains.next())
		userRoleContains.deleteRecord();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-05-12 10:48:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d4ecedd60b9312000c04ed3ab4673adc</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Delete Resource User from Demand Manager</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Project Portfolio Suite" source="com.snc.project_portfolio_suite">1aef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d4ecedd60b9312000c04ed3ab4673adc</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-05-12 13:02:43</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Delete Resource User from Demand Manager
